attributes.action: Stop debating silly petitions. Respect Donald Trump. After all Obama was.
attributes.additional_details: The last silly petition of these same leftist people who think they can ignore 17 million people and stop Brexit. They are the voice of the brainwashed.
attributes.background: This is getting silly now that people can so easily waste time of MPs debating silly leftist causes. If they can start a petition with now 600,000 signatures, lets prove that they are not right and do not represent the views of the whole nation.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
